name: C. Magic Grid
statement:
Let us define a grid to be a square matrix of integers of size n
times n, satisfying the following conditions. All integers from 0 to
(n^2 - 1) inclusive appear in the matrix . Bitwise XOR of all elements
in a row or a column must be the same for each row and column. You are
given an integer n which is a . Construct a grid of size n
times n.
